msbt.message: Hey, ! I'm glad you stopped by.I wanted to say thanks for helping me make the decision to move on from . It wasn't easy, but I think great things are in store for me out there, somewhere Still, I'll always cherish the memories I made here,

Hey, this might be kind of awkward, but I wanted to say thanks for the advice you gave me. You've made a bigger impact on my life than you'll ever know.Alright, enough serious stuff. But seriouslythanks.

Hey, ! I'm so glad you stopped by.I wanted to say thanks before I left the island, since you were the one who helped me make my decision. I'll be moving forward with a full heart thanks to your vote of confidence, .

Ah, this is great timing. I was just looking for you.SoI'm just gonna come out and say it I'm moving away from . Thank you for always being a friend. I'll never forget the time we spent together here.

Oh, hey I don't think we've met, have we?Well, this is a little weird, because I'm about to move away forever, butI'm ! Take good care of the place and never, EVER forget me, won't you?<10_4 /> Ha HA! I'm just messing with you.

Well, if it isn't good old ! Heya!I'm glad I'm getting a chance to tell you the big news—I'm moving away from ! I don't actually know where I'm going yetbut maybe we'll meet again someday. Stay cool and definitely keep . Or start , I guess. Ha HA!
Move to my island!
Godspeed, sir!

Well, if it isn't good old ! Heya!I'm glad I'm getting a chance to tell you the big news—I'm moving away from ! I don't actually know where I'm going yetbut maybe we'll meet again someday. Stay cool and definitely keep . Or start , I guess. Ha HA!
Yo! Good to meet you. The name's !Unfortunately, I'm about to leave this little paradise and move on to the great unknown. Seriously, I have no idea where I'm headed.

What's up, ? If you haven't heard of me, the name's . Though most folks refer to me as 's resident expert in all things style and flash. Whoa. It just hit me that I can't say that anymore. Yeah, I'm moving away from this place tomorrow. Anyway, I hope you'll look me up if you ever make it to my new island.I'm already working on my new tag line, and it should not be missed.
Merci beaucoup! I feel even more confident than I did before, if that's even possible. I'll send the same good energy back your way, compadre. Good luck in your travels!
Guess what.<10_4 /> won the lottery!That's right, I'm ready to move out of and rebrand myself on a new island. Look me up if you ever visit , OK?
Just remember, we're all in the same world, even if we're living on different islands. I guess that's my way of saying I hope we meet up again someday. Take care of yourself!
It's really happening I'm moving back to your home island!Yep, we're gonna be neighbors again, .I'll try not to annoy you by cooking too much this time.
When we meet up nextit'll be on !I know you're like the boss of that place, so you're gonna have to teach me your ways, alright?
Calling it now. <10_4 />I'm changing my name to Von -ington. Nah, maybe I'll stick with plain old for a bit longer.But I am still moving away from !
You know me. I'm the type to just let the tides take me wherever they're flowing. And it's time to float!
Whatever is waiting for me in my new home I will embrace with open arms. Well, almost whatever.
You know what they say, right?<10_4 /> You probably only live once. I believe it's YPOLO for short. Anyway, that's how I live my life. You never know what's gonna come next, so do it with gusto!
You know, really is in a primo location. And I like the island a lot But sometimes you've gotta throw caution to the wind and switch it up! Sowhere should I move?
My island's pretty nice!
I'm not sure.

Your island? You're talking about , right?Yeah, yeahI've heard good things. I guess if you're inviting me, I'll take you up on it! Hey, let's do it right now! I'll give Resident Services a call and get the ball rolling, !

Really? I was secretly hoping you'd say that, !I've actually got the number for your island's Resident Services pre-dialed into my phone Ha HA! Just kidding. But for real, let's get this done right away.
Yeah, me either. Guess I'll throw a dart at a map and see what happens, !
Alright, I talked to Resident Services and I'm back with outstanding news.They said"Oui, monsieur!" which is French for "come on over, buddy!"So, thanks to you, I'll be a new resident of in no time!

OK, I'm back. Sorry about the wait. So, I talked to Resident Services and, well It's a no-go. I guess your island is a real hot spot right now, so there are already too many residents. Ooh, that just makes me want to move there even more! Maybe another time, .

OK, I'm back. Sorry about the wait. So, I talked to Resident Services and, well It's a no-go. I guess your island is a real hot spot right now, so there's nowhere for me to live. Ooh, that just makes me want to move there even more! Maybe another time, .
I can't believe your island is so popular that folks are being turned away I've never wanted to live anywhere more intensely!

No offense, but it sounds like your island is getting a little TOO popular. I'm more of a trend-setter than a trend-follower, so it's just as well that I'm not moving there. Ah, who am I kidding. I WANT TO MOVE THERE SO BADLY!
On second thought Maybe I shouldn't get discouraged so easily, . What do you think? Should I check with Resident Services one more time?
Go for it!
Nah.
Yeah, you're probably right. If it's not meant to be, it's not meant to be.
